content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at Position (-3.5, 23.5)
- Boiler at Position (-7.0, 23.5)
- Offshore Pump at Position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group connecting these entities

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Furnace 1 at Position (-14.0, -49.0)
- Furnace 2 at Position (-12.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserters at Positions (-13.5, -47.5), (-14.5, -45.5), (-13.5, -45.5), (-11.5, -45.5), (-9.5, -44.5), (-14.5, -43.5)
- Iron Chest at Position (-11.5, -44.5)
- Wooden Chests at Positions (-13.5, -46.5), (-13.5, -44.5)
- Belt Group connecting furnaces and chests

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of:
- Belts connecting various positions for material transport, including:
  - Belt from (x=-11.5, y=-46.5) to (x=-9.5, y=-46.5), direction RIGHT
  - Belt from (x=-8.5, y=-45.5) to (x=-8.5, y=-43.5), direction DOWN
  - Additional belts connecting other parts of the facility

### Lab
- Located at an unspecified position, currently with no research in progress

## ERROR TIPS

### Inserter Blockage Errors
- Ensure that inserters have a clear path to deposit items into their destination. Check for blockages in the destination chests or belts.

### Inventory Management Errors
- Before attempting to insert items into entities like furnaces or boilers, verify that the required items are present in your inventory to prevent insertion errors.

### Inserter Waiting for Source Items
- Make sure that the source entities for inserters have items available for pickup to avoid delays in production.

### Destination Chest Full
- Regularly check and clear out destination chests to prevent them from becoming full and blocking further item insertion.

### Errors When Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Move closer to the target entity from which you want to extract items before attempting to extract.

### Errors When Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure the target tile is free of other entities before attempting to place a new entity.
